long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TimeSpy is an online productivity tool that allows users to monitor how their time online is allocated and view accurate data reflecting their online trends. TimeSpy provides user with easily accessible / comprehensible browsing data which includes a running total for time spent on any domain. TimeSpy also provides users with a bar graph showing their most frequented domains. 

Users of TimeSpy may also set timers on domains which will alert them when the set amount of time has been spent at that domain. When the timer has run, the user receives a notification which includes an inspirational quote to help the user get back on track.  

The graphs, timelog and timer are viewed by clicking on the associated icons. All browsing history may be deleted by clicking on the clear log button. If a timer has been set for the active domain, the user can view the remaining time by toggling the timer icon. Once the time has expired the user receives a  notification.
